attributes.action: "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Hold a public enquiry into the polices and running of the RSPB."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "the rspb are taking the role of police by investigating people given this fact who is going to police the rspb when there big questions marks over their activities.  there has never been a watchdog for the rspb and given the evidence,  the rspb’s  hidden agenda and pass history we want an investigation into the past activities of the rspb"
